short_summary: Transportation services for military personnel and their families
duration_in_months: W0118-230005 Services de transport du personnel...
full_summary:
**W0118-230005 Transportation Services**
==============================

**Description**
---------------

The Government of Canada invites interested parties to submit a Regional Individual Standing Offer (RISO) for the provision of two-way transit services to military personnel, residents, and employees of Canadian Forces Base (CFB) Shilo within a 40 km radius of Brandon, Manitoba.

**Overview**
------------

This procurement seeks a transportation services RISO that includes scheduled drop-off and pick-up at designated points, as well as unscheduled runs to be determined on an as-required basis.

**Requirements**
----------------

*   Provide two-way transit services to CFB Shilo within a 40 km radius of Brandon, Manitoba
*   Conduct scheduled drop-off and pick-up at designated points
*   Offer unscheduled runs based on requirements and availability
*   Ensure compliance with all relevant laws, regulations, and safety standards

**Procurement Details**
------------------------

*   **Procurement ID:** W0118-230005
*   **Publication Date:** October 17, 2023
*   **Tender Closing Date:** November 3, 2023 at 2:00 PM EDT
*   **Amendment Date:** October 17, 2023
*   **Expected Contract Start Date:** December 1, 2023
*   **Expected Contract End Date:** November 15, 2024

**Selection Criteria**
---------------------

*   Lowest Price

**Trade Agreements**
------------------

*   Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA)
*   Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP)
*   Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA)
*   Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement
*   World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA)
*   Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA)
*   Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
*   Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement
*   Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA)
*   Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement
*   Canada-Ukraine Free Trade Agreement (CUFTA)
*   Canada-UK Trade Continuity Agreement (Canada-UK TCA)

**Contact Information**
----------------------

*   Wiebe, Lyland
*   Contact Email: [lyland.wiebe@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:lyland.wiebe@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)
*   Contact Number: None
